category: herbs that Clear Heat and Purge Fire

action.primary: Clear Heat, detoxifies, benefit the throat and transforms Phlegm

indications: Chuang Yung, pertussis, cough, swollen throat and chest, Heat in the Stomach or Heart
Irritability, urinary difficulty, fever due to Wind-Heat

action.primary: Calms the Shen, clears vision and tonifies Qi

indications: Inadequate uterine contraction following spontaneous miscarriage
